channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dead fox in hedgerow, 7th March
item.description:
There's a fox carcass in the hedgerow, on the opposite side of the road to nos. 100/102. (Fairly certain it wasn't there yesterday, so most likely it was killed last night.)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 102, Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large rectangle cut out on junction, 7th March
item.description:
There is a large rectangle of tarmac cut out on the Hester’s Way Road side of the junction with Falkland Place.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 108, Hesters Way Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extremely loud manhole constant banging, 7th March
item.description:
If front of the barber there is a manhole that is loose and sunken and this is causing an extremely loud bang when cars/lorry’s go over it. I work outside opposite at least 200 yards away and I can hear it banging all day long And it has been for months. The sound upclose is deafening and way above 85db limit please can this issue be looked at. 62 Swindon road. Please see attached photo.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62, Swindon Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole at the corner of Parabola Road around the manhole, 7th March
item.description:
Damaged road surface and pothole around the edges of the manhole cover which is at the corner of this road. This is just at the point where cars turn into this road from Bayshill Road so handles lots of traffic and needs fixing. The edges of the manhole cover will start to cause damage to wheels
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parabola Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole - general road surface damage, 7th March
item.description:
There are lots of areas of uneven road surface along this short road with one large pothole in particular. A few large potholes and stretches of poor road surface. Needs resurfacing along with Bayshill Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fauconberg Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 7th March
item.description:
email rcvd 27.02.24 - I’m hoping you can help with this complaint. Please see attached photos taken following a customer complaint for a pothole very close to our cover/frame, the cover/frame seem to be ok and aren’t loose. I’ve done a look on our system and have been unable to find any work that relates to STW excavating this cover, I’ve also checked Google Earth and the patch around the cover has been here since at least 2012. Can you advise who I can pass this to please as I don’t believe it falls under the criteria for a Section 81. Many Thanks Reinstatement Technician Gloucester/Worcester water networks
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Major pothole hazard stretching across the carriageway, 7th March
item.description:
Albert Road / Pittville Lawn junction. The pothole affects traffic heading towards Pittville Circus. It is really deep and presents a major hazard to cyclists in particular, but also to cars - currently some vehicles are swerving to avoid and others don't see it and hit it really hard. There is no signage to warn motorists. I am surprised that this is not being repaired as a priority - it is really dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61, Albert Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
